source.d2907828:
def displaying_plot(source):
    
    figure = plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))

    Image_List = []
    plt.style.use("dark_background")
    for indexing in source:
        
        Read_IMG = plt.imshow(indexing, animated=True,cmap="hot")
        plt.axis('off')
        Image_List.append([Read_IMG])

    Animation_Func = animation.ArtistAnimation(figure, Image_List, interval=350, repeat_delay=10200)
    
    plt.close()
    
    return Animation_Func
source.6287464a:
def mapping_disp(lon_p,lat_p,z_p,data_params):
    figure = plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))

    axis_func = plt.axes(projection=ccrs.Orthographic(central_longitude,central_latitude))
    axis_func.set_global()
    axis_func.coastlines(resolution="110m",linewidth=1)
    axis_func.gridlines(linestyle='--',color='black',linewidth=2)

    axis_func.set_extent(extent_real)

    plt.contourf(lon_p, lat_p, z_p[0,:,:], transform=ccrs.PlateCarree(),cmap="seismic")

    color_bar_func = plt.colorbar(ax=axis_func, orientation="vertical", pad=0.05, aspect=16, shrink=0.5).set_label("UNIT DENS",size=15,weight='bold')
    #color_bar_func.ax.tick_params(labelsize=7)

    plt.title(data_params.long_name)
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()
source.f922cf18:
def mapping_time(lon_p,lat_p,z_p):
    list_z = []
    for x_ran_time in range(len(M_10_HUMIDITY_t10m[:,0,0])):
        figure = plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))
        axis_func = plt.axes(projection=ccrs.Orthographic(central_longitude,central_latitude))
        axis_func.set_global()
        axis_func.coastlines(resolution="110m",linewidth=1)
        axis_func.gridlines(linestyle='--',color='black',linewidth=2)

        axis_func.set_extent(extent_real)

        plt.contourf(lon_p, lat_p, z_p[x_ran_time,:,:], transform=ccrs.PlateCarree(),cmap="seismic")
        plt.savefig(f"t10m_{x_ran_time}.jpg")
        plt.close(figure)

        NEW_READING_IMG = cv2.cvtColor(cv2.imread(f"t10m_{x_ran_time}.jpg"),cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB)
        list_z.append(NEW_READING_IMG)

    return list_z

source.de525c12: The ISC Initiative is an independent scientific society founded to protect our planet and explore the universe. The research methods and software were produced within the scope of the laboratory. The purposes of the ISC Initiative are to contribute to the space science and to analyze climatic disasters. ISCI-Lab was established by International Space Science And Climate Observation Initiative - ISCI.
